<script type="text/ecmascript"><![CDATA[
var watertreatmentsvg = document.getElementById('watertreatmentsvg');
console.log(watertreatmentsvg);
var tank1_level = watertreatmentsvg.getElementById('tank1_level');
var tank2_level = watertreatmentsvg.getElementById('tank2_level');
var tank3_level = watertreatmentsvg.getElementById('tank3_level');
var tank4_level = watertreatmentsvg.getElementById('tank4_level');

var rotor1 = watertreatmentsvg.getElementById('filter_rotor_rec1');
var rotor2 = watertreatmentsvg.getElementById('filter_rotor_rec2');

var pump1_fan = watertreatmentsvg.getElementById('pump1_fan');
var pump2_fan = watertreatmentsvg.getElementById('pump2_fan');
var pump3_fan = watertreatmentsvg.getElementById('pump3_fan');
var pump4_fan = watertreatmentsvg.getElementById('pump4_fan');

var pump1_body = watertreatmentsvg.getElementById('pump1_body');
var pump2_body = watertreatmentsvg.getElementById('pump2_body');
var pump3_body = watertreatmentsvg.getElementById('pump3_body');
var pump4_body = watertreatmentsvg.getElementById('pump4_body');
var pumprunning = false;
var filterrunning =false;

(function(scope) {
scope.$watch('msg', function(data) {
  console.dir(data);
  switch (scope.msg.topic) {
    case "tank/level":
    var newlevel = (scope.msg.payload * 181.04878)/100;
    tank1_level.setAttributeNS(null, 'height', newlevel);
    tank2_level.setAttributeNS(null, 'height', newlevel);
    tank3_level.setAttributeNS(null, 'height', newlevel);
    tank4_level.setAttributeNS(null, 'height', newlevel);
    break;
    case "tank2/level":
    var newlevel = (scope.msg.payload * 181.04878)/100;
    tank2_level.setAttributeNS(null, 'height', newlevel);
    break;
    case "tank3/level":
    var newlevel = (scope.msg.payload * 181.04878)/100;
    tank3_level.setAttributeNS(null, 'height', newlevel);
    break;
    case "tank4/level":
    var newlevel = (scope.msg.payload * 181.04878)/100;
    tank4_level.setAttributeNS(null, 'height', newlevel);
    break;
    default:
  }
  if(scope.msg.payload == "run_filter"){
    if(filterrunning){
        return;
    }else{  
    RotateFilter();
    filterrunning = true;
    }
  }
  if(scope.msg.payload == "stop_filter"){
    if(!filterrunning){
        return;
    }else{
    RotateFilter();
    filterrunning = false;
    }
  }
  if(scope.msg.payload == "run_pump"){
    if(pumprunning){
        return;
    }else{  
    RotatePump();
    pumprunning = true;
    }
  }
  if(scope.msg.payload == "stop_pump"){
    if(!pumprunning){
        return;
    }else{  
    RotatePump();
    pumprunning = false;
    }
  }
});
})(scope);

var animator;
var angle = 0;
var nangle = 360
function RotateFilter()
{
  if (animator != null)
  {
      // Just stop
      clearInterval(animator);
      animator = null;
      return;
  }
  animator = setInterval(
      function ()
      {
          angle += 5;
          nangle -= 5
          rotor1.setAttributeNS(null, 'transform', "rotate(" + angle + " 396.6433484790466 485.1910445144043)");
          rotor2.setAttributeNS(null, 'transform', "rotate(" + nangle + " 396.6433484790466 485.1910445144043)");
      }, 80);
}
var animator2;
var angle2 = 0;
var nangle2 = 360
function RotatePump()
{
  if (animator2 != null)
  {
      // Just stop
      clearInterval(animator2);
      animator2 = null;
      pump1_body.setAttributeNS(null, 'style', "fill:#d40000");
      pump2_body.setAttributeNS(null, 'style', "fill:#d40000");
      pump3_body.setAttributeNS(null, 'style', "fill:#d40000");
      pump4_body.setAttributeNS(null, 'style', "fill:#d40000");
      return;
  }
  animator2 = setInterval(
      function ()
      {
          angle2 += 5;
          nangle2 -= 5
          pump1_fan.setAttributeNS(null, 'transform', "translate(0,308.26771) rotate(" + angle2 + " 1248.89697265625 254.40554809570312)");
          pump2_fan.setAttributeNS(null, 'transform', "translate(0,308.26771) rotate(" + angle2 + " 1248.89697265625 254.40554809570312)");
          pump3_fan.setAttributeNS(null, 'transform', "translate(0,308.26771) rotate(" + angle2 + " 1248.89697265625 254.40554809570312)");
          pump4_fan.setAttributeNS(null, 'transform', "translate(0,308.26771) rotate(" + angle2 + " 1248.89697265625 254.40554809570312)");
          pump1_body.setAttributeNS(null, 'style', "fill:#008000");
          pump2_body.setAttributeNS(null, 'style', "fill:#008000");
          pump3_body.setAttributeNS(null, 'style', "fill:#008000");
          pump4_body.setAttributeNS(null, 'style', "fill:#008000");
       }, 90);
}
]]></script>
</svg>
